pageContext.claim: “The Atlantic Magazine is dying, like most magazines, so they make up a fake story in order to gain some relevance. Story already refuted, but this is what we are up against. Just like the Fake Dossier. You fight and and fight, and then people realize it was a total fraud!”
pageContext.analysis: The Atlantic magazine has seen rapid and unexpected growth in subscriptions. Despite layoffs that came early in the pandemic, the institution is far from “dying,” as the president sometimes suggests.
